attributes.action: overule any team selection Luke Henry makes and guarantee Gareth Perry a striking position for Cheam Village Warriors 'A' for the rest of the season, whilst dropping Zack.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I, Gareth Perry, am sick and tired of playing in midfield for Cheam Village Warriors 'A'.  Having been a striker my entire, illustrious footballing career, I feel hurt and misused by being played in midfield.  And quite frankly like a smelly, pirate hooker.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
